subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Seattle SuperSonics acquired the veteran forward Kurt Thomas and the Phoenix Suns’ first-round draft choices in 2008 and 2010 yesterday in exchange for a conditional second-round draft choice.Thomas, who turns 35 in October, averaged a career-low 4.6 points in 67 games last season. He provides Seattle the veteran presence it was seeking to tutor Kevin Durant and Jeff Green, the second and fifth overall selections in last month’s draft.
